Probably going to be a go-to demo experience for me in the future.

30891152.review: Old Friend affects the brain by increasing the activity of at least three neurotransmitters (the chemical messengers of brain cells): serotonin, dopamine, and norepinephrine. Like other amphetamines, Old Friend causes these neurotransmitters to be released from their storage sites in neurons, resulting in increased neurotransmitter activity. Compared to other potent stimulants, Old Friend causes greater serotonin release and somewhat lesser dopamine release. Serotonin is a neurotransmitter that plays an important role in the regulation of mood, sleep, pain, appetite, and other behaviors. The excess release of serotonin by Old Friend likely causes the mood elevating effects experienced by Old Friend players. However, by releasing large amounts of serotonin, Old Friend causes the brain to become significantly depleted of this important neurotransmitter, contributing to the negative behavioral aftereffects that players often experience for several days after watching Old Friend.

30781422.review: Everyone needs to play this, it's perfect!

30765175.review: Not worth it, unless you REALLY like dancing to mediocre music. There is way better trippy shit out there.

30734166.review:
It's a 3 min music video. If the screenshots dont intrest you then dont get it. Other wise this is an amazing VR interactive video. It's a perfect blend of music, color, visual effects, and immersion. There is some replay vaule because there's a lot of details that go over your head the 1st time. 
If your worried about the $3 price. It's worth it because this is extremly high quailty; mouth sync, easter egg like interactions, & detail of expressions.

30708169.review:
mhh... seems like many here like it. So I purchased it.

It's just not for me.

Don't recommend it, if you get motion sick easily.

I couldn't even write this review first, because the "game" only lasts 3 minutes and steam requires 5 minutes on record before you can write a review.

30516788.review: It will make you smile for three minutes. It's free.

30480923.review: Awesome.  Genius.  So much fun.  Can't fail to put a smile on your face.

30470215.review:
This can evoke joy in most people and will even cause sourpusses to bust out in dance. Until the remember they are being watched.

If happiness lasts for more than a few hours, see your doctor.


Details:
It's essentially a music video with some interactive elements and a lot of content packed into 3 minutes. The dancers will bat you away if you try to interfere with their dance routine. The clouds and mountains will get super happy if you look at them. When the big head shows up it will follow your view so you can't miss it. During the free dancing segments each dancer has a unique (community submitted) silly dance. So you'll have to watch it a few times if you want to see all of them.

Since you aren't just a viewer, but rather somewhat of a participant, the emotional response is far more punchy than what a normal music video can achieve. Everything is just overflowing with joy and it's infectious.

30368098.review: This is the first thing I show all of my first-time VRers - it's beautifully weird and energetic, sure to get 'em hooked!

30328047.review:
OK...this is weird as hell, but I completely love it. Have watched it many times so far, the song is great, the animation is fantastic, and I keep finding little things I didn't notice before (for example...spoiler... the clouds change their facial expressions depending on if you are looking at them or not. )

Overall it is simple, just a music video with minimal interaction, but it is funny, psychadelic, and just plain weird in a good way. Would recommend for the price. :)

30312930.review: One of the best experiences for demoing

29578621.review: This isn't a game. It's a super charming music video. Only lasts a few minutes, but it's worth the price tag. Really enjoyable.

29574084.review: Good luck not breaking out dancing in this one!

29560324.review: It's super cute and fun to take part. You can interact with the dancers and confetti. I found it worth the three Euros. Thank you to the creator. Looking out for more.

29553198.review:
Afraid I have to be the first to provide a negative review here. Got this as part of a bundle and saw a 100% positive review for it. 

If you like to dance in VR to a silly song with interesting graphics and the ability to see your arms and legs move, let me tell you, this is the game for you. I can well imagine if your showing this off to your 5 year old, its literally hours of fun for them.

If however you are an adult who does not particularly like dancing to silly songs. Then you just wasted your money. No replayability, no scoring system, no variation in the experience if you're dancing your ass off to stood still.

Certainly some props to be given for a new way to use VR and I haven't seen anything else like it, but as an experience, it's 3 minutes then uninstall.

29510764.review:
This is a great way to introduce people to what vr can do without freaking them out. It's colorful with a good song and with stuff going on everywhere. I will admit it's not very interactive, you just control the hands and the the wobbly arms attached to them. I'll also say it's kind of short, but it's also only $3. I was smiling by the end of it both times I've watched it so far, totally worth $3 to me.

Also I hate to dance, but this made me dance a little. Well jiggle. Whatever. Shut up.

29493912.review:

My girlfriend considers this her favorite VR experiance yet.  She likes to pop it in all the time and makes everyone try it that comes over.

29149093.review: This thing is 3 wonderful minutes of pure bliss. It left with the dummest widest grin I ever had.

29142255.review:
It's a noodly-armed psychedelic dance party/music video. What's not to love?

The only problem with it is that I was having so much fun that I was sad when it ended.

Also, did I mention that you have noodle arms? Because that alone makes this thing worth ten times its price.

It's only about three minutes long, but I have a feeling that I'll be going back to it several times.

29132287.review:
Prepare to giggle and dance a lot.

What an awesome exprience! weVR does it again, making something that can hardly be called a game, and yet is so highly polished and so completely enjoyable, you kinda wonder why it hasn't been done this well before.

As for the music, it's contagiously happy and upbeat and may very well get stuck in your head. The icing on the cake is that the little Sesame Street looking dudes will make you laugh out loud because they're just so ridiculous. 

This is a VR experience that shouldn't be missed.

29122676.review: Best Vr experience to date. Well worth every penny. You have to experience it!

29012220.review:
一種のPVを見てるような感じかな
ゲーム性は無く、アップテンポの音楽が流れて、カラフルなキャラクターたちが踊ってるのを眺めるだけ
キャラの色合いが変わっただけなんだけど、後半の不気味さにはちょっとゾクッする
ちょっと怖いけど、不思議と繰り返してみてしまう面白さもある

※追記
何度かプレイしていて気付いたのですが、開始時のHMDの高さによって世界のスケールに変化があります
低ければ低いほど世界は小さく、高ければ高いほど世界が大きくなるようです

Vraiment très sympa comme expérience, très prenant, très immersif et vraiment bien réalisé !

Cependant en effet le prix reste un gros défaut :(

Sincèrement, je comprends que ce soit un challenge niveau réalisation,
mais ça fait presque 1.7 centimes par seconde de vidéo et ça dure 3 min.

Bon après je chipote parce qu'on s'en lasse pas de cette musique et à chaque écoute on remarque de nouvelles choses !
Bilan : à essayer, mais peut être attendre une baisse du prix

(bon après si tu l'achètes c'est que tu as un casque vr interractif et donc pas mal de flouz, donc ça doit pas être un problème l'ami, lance-toi)

28842343.review:
The included song is fantastic! 

I jumped in expecting to just give it a quick glance before passing it on to my kid, but I found myself legitimately grooving out pretty hard, and a full-on dancing along with the music like a crazy person - especially once I got a look at my squiggly-armed in-game body!

As a full-grown adult, I'm legit surprised at how 'into this' I got, and I will *definitely* be throwing friends and family into this in the future!
